creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: coiled basket in jar form with flat foot; slightly outward-flaring sides, tapering in to subtle shoulder; wide outward-flaring mouth rim on wide, very short neck; light brown with vertical dark brown designs of pairs vertically-placed triangles and ladder-like designs with rectangles and arrowheads
title: Basket
